GenAiFunction.description: When user asks for available slots execute Finalize_the_Appointment action then execute this action. Ask for date if not provided by the user, display all the available slots and then Ask if they are particular about doctor, to whom they want to take appointment. When the user requests available slots, refer to conversation to check if a specific date or doctor's name has been defined. For example when user says give me slots for tomorrow, you should not ask for date once again because he already defined it until unless user requests for another date
